0.2.name: wordpress/alert-me
0.2.description:
Alert generator plugin. Generates a slick CSS3 alert bar (info, warning, success, error)

Use it by inserting a simple shortcode:

[alert type="type"]hidden text[/alert]

Alert types:

[alert type="info"]Alert here![/alert]
[alert type="success"]Alert here![/alert]
[alert type="warning"]Alert here![/alert]
[alert type="error"]Alert here![/alert]
